name: the last dance of the immortals
name_original: the last dance of the immortals
description:
STORY

It's the end of the universe.

The last star of all galaxies shines waiting for its death.

All the immortals gather around it, dancing to celebrate the end of everything.

And you, one of them, meets Death, at last.

FEATURES

- Around 5 min to complete the game (yes it's very very short).

WARNINGS

 - Existencialism, mention of death, anxiety.

CREDITS

- Art, story, GUI, programming: Helen (@lenlen403)

- Music: Blind Improvisation -  Yiruma

Made for O2A2 2022! (in literally 2 hours what am i doing)
